ShortDescription.Value: Visualizes vehicles attempts and failures to find parking spots

Publish.LongDescription:
Visualizes vehicles attempts and failures to find parking spots.
Features: * Display all parking volume or failed parking volume per lot, building, and road * Group data by district * Navigate to lot, building, and road with one click * View total number of cars circling the map looking for parking * View total number of cars planning to park
How does it work?: This mod monitors the destination of each vehicle. If a vehicle has a parking spot on its route, and its parking spot changes without the passenger's final destination changing, it counts a failed parking attempt. A vehicle is considered "looking for parking" if it has at least one failed parking attempt.
Note: This is a beta mod, and the data may be slightly inaccurate in certain edge cases.
